China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2023 年 12 月 26 日星期二 19:35:15 GMT 120
Canada ready to pay settlements to two men imprisoned in China in 2018 - reportCanada's government is willing to sign off on multimillion-dollar settlement packages for Canadians Michael Spavor and Michael Kovrig to compensate them for the near three years they were incarcerated in Chinese prisons, the Globe and Mail reported on Tuesday, citing government sources. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 14:33:53 GMT QSOZAIEKSZILJHAUS5CBERX54U https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/canada-ready-pay-settlements-two-men-imprisoned-china-2018-report-2023-12-26/Reuters世界美洲
US extends tariff exclusions on some Chinese categories till May 31The office of U.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai on Tuesday announced a further extension of China "Section 301" tariff exclusions on 352 Chinese import and 77 COVID-19-related categories till May 31, 2024. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 13:18:33 GMT TAOR57STANJ7BE6PKUENG2AC3A https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-extends-tariff-exclusions-some-chinese-categories-till-may-31-2023-12-26/Kanishka Singh世界美国
Xi vows to prevent anyone 'splitting Taiwan from China'President Xi Jinping vowed on Tuesday to resolutely prevent anyone from "splitting Taiwan from China in any way", the official Xinhua news agency reported, a little more than two weeks before Taiwan elects a new leader. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 13:02:41 GMT CGX7UKC55FPDXOY7WCXTZCX32E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/xi-vows-prevent-anyone-splitting-taiwan-china-2023-12-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
Taiwan expands Russian sanctions to stop tech being used for weaponsTaiwan's economy ministry said on Tuesday it had expanded a list of sanctioned goods for Russia and its ally Belarus in response to Russia's invasion of Ukraine to prevent Taiwanese high-tech goods from being used for military purposes. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 11:31:34 GMT S5O5SL6PTVL2HACBKG5MZTSHH4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-expands- Russian-sanctions-stop-tech-being-used-arms-2023-12-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
Big oil enters 2024 strengthened by U.S. industry consolidationThe oil and gas industry went on a $250 billion buying spree in 2023, taking advantage of companies' high stock prices to secure lower-cost reserves and prepare for the next upheaval in an industry likely to undergo more consolidation. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 11:02:44 GMT MOALFKIJPROM5EDA2P27WHBE3Q https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/big-oil-enters-2024-strengthened-by-us-industry-consolidation-2023-12-26/Gary Mcwilliams商业活力
Taiwan presidential frontrunner accuses opposition party of being 'pro-communist'The frontrunner to be Taiwan's next president accused the main opposition party of betraying the anti-communist ideals of its forefathers and being overtly pro-China, ahead of next month's election. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 09:20:59 GMT 6Q2G4A4Z2NMFDBBBPII7PGVHVU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-presidential-frontrunner-accuses-opposition-party-being-pro-communist-2023-12-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
China cracks down on hundreds of millions of dollars of government investment scamsChinese police this year have cracked down on hundreds of millions of dollars of fraud cases using fabricated government documents to attract investment in fake national projects, state media reported on Tuesday. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 08:47:18 GMT NR36RAWA25LK3N3F2RP4KNQFKQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-cracks-down-hundreds-millions-dollars-government-investment-scams-2023-12-26/Reuters世界中国
AstraZeneca to buy China's Gracell Biotechnologies in $1.2 billion dealAstraZeneca said on Tuesday it will buy Gracell Biotechnologies for up to $1.2 billion as the Anglo-Swedish pharma company furthers its cell therapy ambitions and boosts its presence in China, the world's second-largest pharmaceuticals market. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 07:13:22 GMT AMGHYV62QJNSHJTNNEB6UCWBF4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/aztrazeneca-buy-china-based-gracell-biotechnologies-12-bln-deal-2023-12-26/Urvi Dugar, Christy Santhosh市场交易
Chinese gaming firms unveil share buybacks after regulatory move unnerves investorsA slew of smaller Chinese gaming companies have announced share buybacks - plans seen as an attempt to reassure investors after the market was spooked by regulatory moves to clamp down on consumer spending on games. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 05:49:12 GMT EK2D2WVFANLENHJ6YKJ7BCCZO4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-gaming-firms-unveil-share-buybacks-after-regulatory-move-unnerves-2023-12-26/Li Gu, Casey Hall世界中国
Philippines is not provoking conflict in South China Sea, its military saysThe Philippines is not provoking conflict in the South China Sea, its military spokesperson said on Tuesday, responding to China's accusation that Manila was encroaching on Beijing's territory. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 05:14:50 GMT UBX2WSIGXBJJHAJL7XJYTQ44XU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-not-provoking-conflict-south-china-sea-military-spokesperson-2023-12-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
China expects searing heat, more weather extremes in 2024China - grappling with one of its coldest Decembers on record - will likely have to brace for another round of scorching heat and an increase in extreme weather next year due to the El Nino weather phenomenon, a senior climate expert said. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 04:49:05 GMT H2EF2YAKGRKSHE7PF6IZCSENAI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-expects-searing-heat-more-weather-extremes-2024-2023-12-26/Liz Lee世界中国
